tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE market_trends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    market_segment VARCHAR(255),
    trend_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    sales_volume INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE growth_opportunities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    opportunity_name VARCHAR(255),
    strategy TEXT,
    target_market VARCHAR(50),
    growth_rate DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE market_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_date DATE,
    trend VARCHAR(255),
    growth_opportunity_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (growth_opportunity_id) REFERENCES growth_opportunities(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Market_trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255),
    trend_description TEXT,
    trend_category VARCHAR(50),
    trend_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Growth_opportunities (
    opportunity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    opportunity_name VARCHAR(255),
    opportunity_description TEXT,
    opportunity_category VARCHAR(50),
    opportunity_date DATE
);
